issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
Hey there!

Can you please provide a full example that we can reproduce? I tested the edit actions yesterday for TIMOB-19335 and they worked like a charm. Thanks!
